import sys
import math

def main():
	t = int(sys.stdin.readline())

	for i in range(0, t):
		n = int(sys.stdin.readline())

		lastVoteMap = {}
		voteCount = 0
		for j in range(0, n):
			userid, vote = sys.stdin.readline().split()
			
			if userid in lastVoteMap:
				if (vote == '+' and lastVoteMap[userid] == '-'):
					voteCount = voteCount + 2
				elif (vote == '-' and lastVoteMap[userid] == '+'):
					voteCount = voteCount - 2
			
			else:
				if (vote == '+'):
					voteCount = voteCount + 1
				else:
					voteCount = voteCount - 1
			lastVoteMap[userid] = vote


		print voteCount	
						
				
main()
